ygData.subject: Racial Armor - When to Start?
ygData.msgSnippet: My skill is currently at 177 and I was wondering at what point I should start attempting the magical racial armor. As a dwarf, my temper is Earthen, and I have
ygData.messageBody:
My skill is currently at 177 and I was wondering at what point I
should start attempting the magical racial armor. As a dwarf, my
temper is Earthen, and I have a really hard time finding the
necessary components to make it. I can get the drops of Mercury from
Earth Elementals in Steamfont, but for the life of me, finding Lava
Rock has been a nightmare (I have 1 piece at the moment).

So, I don't want to waste my precious Tempers too early in the
process. About what skill level is reasonable to start the Imbued
armors?


Many thanks,

- Khazade
Paladin of the Duke of Below
GM, The Peacekeepers of Norrath
Tallon Zek
khazade@...
http://www.cheatsearch.com/eq
